title: Raspberry whip

ingredients.content: fresh berries or frozen berries of choice, to serve (optional)

preparations.content: Place sugar into mixing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add frozen raspberries and lemon juice and blend <b>15 sec/speed 5<b>-10<b>, <b>increasing speed gradually from speed 5 to speed 10<b>, mixing with aid of spatula.

<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Add egg whites and beat <b>2 min/speed 4<b> or until fluffy. <b>Remove butterfly whisk.<b> Divide between serving bowls and decorate with fresh or frozen berries of choice, to serve (optional - see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: You can use any frozen berries of choice in this recipe.
You can make this recipe up to 30 minutes in advance - simply store in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
